description: This updates an existing pricing plan.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pricing plan that you're updating.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated pricing plan.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the pricing plan. The name must be unique to each pricing plan.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The new description for the pricing rule.

nested_items.name: Size
nested_items.description: The pricing rules count that's currently associated with this pricing plan list.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the pricing plan was modified.
